ygData.subject: Re: Cross-class research?
ygData.msgSnippet: Often some spells require more than just Words/Runes/Pages to be built.  For instance, many Magician spells require other reagents, Aviak Feather, precious
ygData.messageBody:
Often some spells require more than just Words/Runes/Pages to be
built. For instance, many Magician spells require other reagents, Aviak
Feather, precious tones, water, etc. They are there probably to make
getting some of those components easier.

Malark on Karana

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Robin McCaig [mailto:twister@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 10:18 AM

>
>
> From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>

>
